summary: i made a new texture for stormshallows \"Sheep Modders Resource\" mod you need to download that mode for this texture to work. this texture replaces all 3 sheeps with a new texture
descriptionHtml:
i really liked th sheep mod and made a new texture for stormshallows \"Sheep Modders Resource\" mod for myself than decided to share it. it adds eyes mouth and nose and makes them look more fluffy. you need to download that mode for this texture to work. this texture replaces all 3 sheeps with a single new texture 

download the new 3 variations version to have them in different colors just like the original one all white one all brown and one with black face 


to install
you need to have the \"Sheep Modders Resource\" installed, than unzip this file and place the files to your skyrim folder Data/Textures/actors/sheep say yes to overwrite

you can download stormshallows original mod here. you need to download the original mod first
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/33273/?

thank you stormshallow
author: cansu
